metadata.creator: Pixelated Audio
metadata.description:
Pixelated Audio is excited to bring Megan McDuffeeinto the studio to chat with us about her work for the recently released River City Girls!

River City Girlsis a classic action beat-em-up with light RPG elements, building on the long legacy of River City (or Kunio-Kun) games started by Technosin the 1980s. It was released September 5th, 2019 for the Nintendo Switch, PS4, Xbox One and Steam and developed by WayForward Technologieswith oversight and some publishing handled by Arc System Works.

Megan McDuffeehas been making a name for herself in the music community as a synthwave vocalist and producer, composer and sound designer. She has worked on several games with River City Girls being her biggest game to date. Megan brings the heat to this soundtrack with high energy dance music, thrilling vocals, and crisp production work on over 50 tracks with her signature 80's inspired synthwave sound.

Additional tracks in the game are provided by Chipzel, NateWantsToBattle, Christina Vee, and Dale North, which can be found on the full soundtrack. We hope you enjoy the music and this show as much as we do!

Track List:

All music composed by Megan McDuffeeunless otherwise stated

  • 0:00:00 Lunch Money
  • 0:00:00 Bully
  • 0:00:00 Knock Out (remix of Jail Fight)
  • 0:00:00 Jail Fightfrom Shin Nekketsu Kōha: Kunio-tachi no Banka, composed by Hitoshi Yamane
  • 0:00:00 Detention
  • 0:00:00 The Hunt
  • 0:00:00 Don't Give A...
    • remix of Street Theme / Main Theme from River City Ransom, composed by Kazuo Sawa
  • 0:00:00 Watch Your Back
  • 0:00:00 Skull Crackin'
  • 0:00:00 Yesterday (Unused) - PA Exclusive!
  • 0:00:00 Tidal Wave
  • 0:00:00 Boardwalk
  • 0:00:00 Boss: Noize
  • 0:00:00 Azukay
  • 0:00:00 Manga 5

If you'd like to hear more work from Megan McDuffee, check out the links below!

  • River City Girls Soundtrack- Link to purchase or stream
  • Megan McDuffee bandcamp
    • Album - Hero by Alex and Megan McDuffee
    • Music Video - Streets - Moonrunner83 & Megan McDuffee
    • Website - Megan McDuffee website
  • Badass Ladies - Squashing The Gender Gap in Game Audio- Panel at MAGWest 1
